column2: Rapid breathing, but quick reflexes. Large, ulcerated tumor on top of head, small tumor on right shoulder.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Tumor was ulcerated, but still solid. A secondary tumor was found on the right shoulder and slightly empeded movement of the mouse.
Difficult respiration, but the lungs seemed to have no large metastatic nodes upon visual inspection.
